| **Function**                                      | Example                                                            | **What does this function do?**    |

|                                                   |                                                                    |                                    |

+---------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------+
| `year(...)`                                       | `year(bday)`                                                       |                                    |
|                                                   |                                                                    |                                    |
| `month(...)`                                      | `month(bday)`                                                      |                                    |
|                                                   |                                                                    |                                    |

| `wday(...,      label = TRUE,      abbr = FALSE)` | `wday(bday,      label = TRUE,      abbr = FALSE)`                 |                                    |

| `as.duration(...)`                                | `as.duration(   today() - mdy(01141989)             )`             |                                    |

+---------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------+
| `interval(...)`                                   | `interval(date1, date2)`                                           |                                    |

| `with_tz(...)`                                    | `with_tz(bday,         tzone = "Europe/Copenhagen")`               |                                    |
+---------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------+
| `force_tz(...)`                                   | `force_tz(bday,         tzone = "Europe/Copenhagen")`              |                                    |
